last_episode_to_air.name: 24 Hours in a Strip Club
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nikki goes to Las Vegas, where she attempts to remain in a strip club for 24 hours; and plays Tinder Tapout with Jim Norton and Bridget Everett.

name: Not Safe with Nikki Glaser
overview: Not Safe with Nikki Glaser blends interviews, experiments, and discussions about subjects revolving around sex, relationships, and the stuff nobody wants to talk about.

episodes.name: Carpe Do 'Em
episodes.overview: Comedian Nikki Glaser explores sex, relationships and other taboo topics in this series, which begins with a look at the dating app Tinder with Rachel Feinstein and Rory Scovel. Also: a visit to a foot-fetish party; an examination of the "friend zone."

episodes.name: Dick Moves
episodes.overview: Nikki stages a photo shoot to help men work on their sexting skills; and picks up guys coming out of strip clubs to quiz them on women. Also: comedian Ron Funches.

episodes.name: I'm the Boat
episodes.overview: Nicki helps porn actors with their lines; and talks about friends who've been left behind with Chris D'Elia and Esther Povitsky.

episodes.name: Already Wet
episodes.overview: Nikki sits on a sex toy and discusses female ejaculation with Sara Schaefer; she researches her parents' sex lives.

episodes.name: Don't Touch That Remote
episodes.overview: Nikki talks to hotel maids to hear horror stories about cleaning up after guests have sex; plays a game of Tinder Tapout; and talks to people about digital penetration.

episodes.name: Find My Boyfriend a Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Nikki takes on the subject of polyamory, interviews an Uber driver about a hookup with a passenger and chats with T.J. Miller and Pete Holmes.

episodes.name: Your Wedding Sucks
episodes.overview: Nikki confronts engaged couples about how their weddings are inconveniencing their friends.

episodes.name: Get Her a Glass of Water
episodes.overview: Nikki discusses one-night stands; feeds lines to porn actors during a shoot.

episodes.name: Panty Sniffers
episodes.overview: Nikki listens to sex advice from columnist Dan Savage; and interviews underwear fetishists. Also: a chat with Todd Glass and Nick Thune.

episodes.name: I Broke My Dick
episodes.overview: Nikki plays a round of Tinder Tapout with special guests Patton Oswalt and Natasha Leggero.

episodes.name: Is That Your Belt?
episodes.overview: People who are paid to cuddle are profiled. Also: Nikki plays Tinder Tapout with Mary Lynn Rajskub and Adam Pally.

episodes.name: I Miss David Bowie
episodes.overview: Women in the workplace through the lens of pornography is a topic of discussion with Kristen Schaal. Also: a chat with Chris D'Elia and Kate Walsh.

episodes.name: Really Real R&B
episodes.overview: Nikki turns to music artist Omarion to pen a new R&B hit about real-life sex stories. Also: Anthony Jeselnik and Riki Lindhome play "What's Your Number?"

episodes.name: Make America Horny Again
episodes.overview: Nikki goes to a Donald Trump rally in San Diego to quiz his supporters on sex; and discusses infidelity with Maria Bamford and Marc Maron.

episodes.name: Mysteries of the Female Orgasm
episodes.overview: Nikki teams up with a group of women to conduct groundbreaking research on the female orgasm and learns about flirting via GIFs with guests Jim Jefferies and Liza Treyger.

episodes.name: Blind Date Champion
episodes.overview: Nikki looks at dreadfully bad dates with Dave Waite; and plays Tinder Tapout with Ron Funches and Katie Nolan.

episodes.name: Rock-Hard Weekend
episodes.overview: Dr. Drew Pinsky discusses the popularity of over-the-counter male-enhancement pills. Also: David Spade and Nicole Byer talk to kittens about complex social issues.

episodes.name: Is This Forever?
episodes.overview: Nikki provides the dialogue for a hospital porn scene, calls out annoying behavior on social media with her guests and works with couples to plan for their eventual breakup.

episodes.name: Museum of Broken Relationships
episodes.overview: Nikki visits a museum full of people's old relationship keepsakes, debunks myths about bisexuals with Margaret Cho and rails against the injustices of America's wage gap.

episodes.name: 24 Hours in a Strip Club
episodes.overview: Nikki goes to Las Vegas, where she attempts to remain in a strip club for 24 hours; and plays Tinder Tapout with Jim Norton and Bridget Everett.
